HomeWiki:
Project Description
Office Mini Editor
want to be a set of WinForm controls small and fast with a minimal editing functions.
The first step is development of the Word control.
Microsoft Office installation isn't required.
Based on MS-DOC specification and MS-CFB specification
OME control collaborate with class collection from OpenMCFD. to realize access at Compound File Storage.

Release from 04.2015 features:
  • open and display without formating any .doc file.
